title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reinventing credit origination process through AI (IND372)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过AI重塑信贷发起流程 (IND372)
abstract: Credit is still a very laborious process in financial institutions. Join this session to hear from Cloudera industry expert Adrien Chenallier how firms can integrate reasoning models with agentic patterns to reach a credit decision efficiently. We will focus on ensuring compliance and implementing strategies to ensure potential errors are flagged for escalation, which is critical for financial institutions and other highly regulated industries managing sensitive data. This presentation is brought to you by Cloudera, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 信贷仍然是金融机构中一个非常繁重的流程。加入本次会议，聆听Cloudera行业专家Adrien Chenallier分享企业如何将推理模型与代理模式相结合，高效地做出信贷决策。我们将重点关注确保合规性并实施策略来确保潜在错误被标记以供升级处理，这对于管理敏感数据的金融机构和其他高度监管行业至关重要。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Cloudera为您呈现。
